summary: It takes nearly on hour to compile this file

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. wget https://raw.github.com/timvisher/painful-clojurescript-compilation/master/target/none/painful-clojurescript-compilation/core.js 2. time java -jar compiler.jar --compilation_level WHITESPACE_ONLY --js core.js --js_output_file painful-clojurescript-compilation-whitespace-manual.js What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I just expect it to take a reasonable amount of time to compile. Under a minute? Ironically, whitespace optimizations only takes the longest, but none of the optimizations take less than 45 minutes. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Closure Compiler (http://code.google.com/closure/compiler) Version: v20131014 Built on: 2013/10/15 09:45 MacBook Air 2 GHz Intel Core i7 8 GB 1600 Mhz DDR3 Intel HD Graphics 4000 512 MB OS X 10.8.5 (12F45) Please provide any additional information below. core.js is a file generated by clojurescript from https://raw.github.com/timvisher/painful-clojurescript-compilation/master/src/painful_clojurescript_compilation/core.cljs
try inserting some new lines. when i replace ",new" with ",\nnew", compile times go down to about 3 sec.

I also posted a fix here
https://codereview.appspot.com/15440047/
Thanks for this. Had no idea something that simple have such a dramatic effect!
